column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I went here for a friend's birthday in July
column2: and I can honestly say I do not have a bad word to say about the place. I am not big on tapas or Spanish food
column3: so I had no expectations walking in. They defiantly blew me out of the water on everything. The waitress recommended that each person pick 3 plates each and then just pass around everything to share
column4: so that's what we did. A little tip that is WAY too much food!!!!! We were swimming in plates. But everything was very tasty
column5: there was not a single plate ordered that we did not enjoy. My recommendation is to look for the things you know you like chicken
column8: or seafood and pick anything that sounds good. We went with a few adventurous options and really enjoyed those as well!! Â
